都て: (かつて) - once/before/formerly/ever/former/ex-; (used with neg. verb) never yet/never before/first time/still not happened
都をどり: (みやこをどり) - dance performance held in April by geisha and maiko in Kyoto's Gion district
都下: (とか) - in the capital; in Tokyo
都人: (とじん) - residents of the capital; townsfolk
都会を離れる: (とかいをはなれる) - to leave town
都入り: (みやこいり) - arriving in the capital
都合: (tsugou) - circunstâncias, condição, conveniência; organizar, administrar; emprestar dinheiro, arrecadar dinheiro; ao todo, no total, tudo somado
都合がいい: (つごうがいい) - (ant: 都合が悪い) convenient
都合がつく: (つごうがつく) - to be possible (in terms of time, money, etc.); to be able (to do)
都合がよろしい: (つごうがよろしい) - (usu. ご都合がよろしい) convenient
都合がわるい: (つごうがわるい) - (ant: 都合がいい) inconvenient
都合が付く: (つごうがつく) - to be possible (in terms of time, money, etc.); to be able (to do)
都合が悪い: (つごうがわるい) - (ant: 都合がいい) inconvenient
都合が良い: (つごうがよい) - (ant: 都合が悪い) convenient
都合のいい: (つごうのいい) - (ant: 都合の悪い) convenient
都合のよろしい: (つごうのよろしい) - (usu. ご都合がよろしい)  convenient
都合のわるい: (つごうのわるい) - (ant: 都合のいい) inconvenient
都合の宜しい: (つごうのよろしい) - (usu. ご都合がよろしい)  convenient
都合の悪い: (つごうのわるい) - (ant: 都合のいい) inconvenient
都合の良い: (つごうのよい) - (ant: 都合の悪い) convenient
都合次第: (つごうしだい) - (yoji) depending on the (one's) situation (circumstances); at one's pleasure
都営: (とえい) - operated by the metropolitan government
都察院: (とさついん) - Censorate (Ming and Qing-dynasty surveillance agency)
都寺: (つうす) - one of the six administrators of a Zen temple
都市交通: (としこうつう) - urban transport; urban transit
都市再開発: (としさいかいはつ) - urban redevelopment
都市圏: (としけん) - urban area; metropolitan area; metropolitan region
都市工学: (としこうがく) - urban engineering; municipal engineering
都市生態学: (としせいたいがく) - urban ecology
都市経済学: (としけいざいがく) - urban economics
都市計画: (としけいかく) - city planning; urban planning; town planning
都市計画税: (としけいかくぜい) - city planning tax
都市銀行: (としぎんこう) - city bank; metropolitan bank
都庁舎: (とちょうしゃ) - Tokyo Metropolitan Government Office building
都心: (としん) - city centre (center) (esp. capital city); urban centre; heart of city a metropolis
都心部: (としんぶ) - inner-city area; city center
都忘れ: (みやこわすれ) - Miyamayomena savateri; Gymnaster savatieri
都民: (とみん) - city populace; resident of Tokyo
都民会館: (とみんかいかん) - Tokyo meeting hall
都民税: (とみんぜい) - Tokyo metropolitan residents' tax
都知事: (とちじ) - metropolitan governor; governor of Tokyo
都立: (とりつ) - metropolitan (i.e. established by the Tokyo Metropolitan Government)
都立高校: (とりつこうこう) - metropolitan high school
都立高等学校: (とりつこうとうがっこう) - prefectural senior high school (in Tokyo Metropolitan Area); public senior high school (in Tokyo Metropolitan Area)
都節音階: (みやこぶしおんかい) - miyako-bushi scale (characteristic Japanese hemitonic pentatonic scale: mi, fa, la, ti, do)
都草: (ミヤコグサ) - bird's-foot trefoil (Lotus corniculatus, esp. Lotus corniculatus var. japonicus); birdsfoot trefoil
都護: (とご) - Protector General/Tang-period Chinese official in charge of the local Protectorate General; travelling inspector of the provincial governments (Nara- and Heian-period position)
都護府: (とごふ) - Protectorate General; Han- and Tang-period Chinese office established to pacify and control peoples on the frontier (during the Tang period, six major Protectorate Generals were established)
都踊り: (みやこおどり) - dance performance held in April by geisha and maiko in Kyoto's Gion district
都道府県: (todoufuken) - divisões administrativas do Japão: Tóquio-to, Hokkai-do, Osaka-fu, Kyoto-fu e as demais prefeituras
都道府県別: (とどうふけんべつ) - by prefecture
都都逸: (どどいつ) - unrhymed non-metrical Japanese popular love song or limerick in the 7-7-7-5 syllable pattern
都鱮: (ミヤコタナゴ) - Tokyo bitterling (species of cyprinid fish, Tanakia tanago)
都鳥: (ミヤコドリ) - Eurasian oystercatcher (Haematopus ostralegus); black-headed gull (Larus ridibundus); Cinnalepeta pulchella (species of spiral-shelled gastropod)
都鳥貝: (ミヤコドリガイ) - Cinnalepeta pulchella (species of spiral-shelled gastropod)
鄙びる: (ひなびる) - to become rustic; to be countrified
鄙人: (とひと) - countryfolk/villager/provincial; (ひじん only)   greedy person/underclass/low-standing person
鄙劣: (ひれつ) - mean; foul play; cowardly; base
鄙懐: (ひかい) - one's own thought; one's own idea
鄙振り: (ひなぶり) - appearing rustic; ancient song played at the court; comical tanka
鄙蝙蝠: (ヒナコウモリ) - vesper bat (Vespertilionidae spp., esp. the Asian particolored bat, Vespertilio sinensis); evening bat; common bat
